snippet.title: Stay Still 2 - Launch Trailer 4K
snippet.description:
⚡ - BUY NOW
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2537770/Stay_Still_2/

⚡ NEW WEBSITE : https://galactic-crows.com ⚡

🎬 JOIN OUR DISCORD: https://discord.gg/qXZUGDvkmV 🎬

Prepare yourself for a bone-chilling adventure in "Stay Still 2," the thrilling ghost story that will keep you on the edge of your seat! Hung, a risk-taking adventurer, seeks out the most extraordinary experiences. When he stumbles upon a cheap, creepy house with a dark history, he can't resist the temptation to stay for a night filled with spine-tingling thrills.
Explore the eerie house and uncover its haunting past as you encounter mysterious figures and disturbing noises. Piece together clues and solve terrifying puzzles in a desperate attempt to escape the clutches of the vengeful ghost. But beware, the horrors within are beyond imagination!

Instagram: https://instagram.com/galacticcrows
Twitter: https://twitter.com/galaccticrows
Facebook: https://facebook.com/galacticrows
Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@galacticcrowsofficial
